post.body: ack - I'm sick and stupid school or else I'd be all over it. I've never met maddux OR paisley
unfortunately not a onustee :( just plain old yellow. az kinda kicks a** 'cause you can wear tees yr round. and tee are my fave
haha...that's classic. And, dare I say, awesome.
thanks! @starbucks did you hear that? 2 people agree only about a million more to go.
what the heck at qwitters?
haha...good for you. think i'll follow her too. hope everything works out for her.
can you guys make the top of those stopper sticks different shapes for holiday. deer or snowman?
I, personally, like to think of your pic as a superhero pose. Great job!
tart tartain and tartan are parts of my holiday.
you are so crafty! We need to get crafting together :)
I Starbucks to start my morning. The laughs and chit-chat I get early in the morning start my day off just right.
photography is my art. But i don't feel like an artist.
fave candy: Reese's Sticks.
congrats! That is going to be sOooo exciting :)
HAHAHA...wasted more gas and resources by getting the car out there. Fantastic. Way to go Big 3. Idiots.
good luck with your meeting today. hope you do well for your part!
seriously. amen to that.
it comes from cuteoverload.com at least that's where i got it. same thing with prosh and tock
wait - is priscilla on twitter! where's my shout out?
Breitling Watch!
Barista this morning gave me something for my finger since I burned it earlier @home.That's why I Starbucks. I've made friends.
OH my. I'll remember that. Good luck getting that stuff out
it took me a while to figure that out. i figured it was honesty or ON US Tees. Like it was ON US to make a difference.
nice - say hello for me. :)
how geeky do i have to be to actually WIN?!!!
oh yeah - its days like this that arizona kicks ass.
japan kicks our butt in the cute dept. they've got cute down.
i am so jealous right now. My friend is playing polo and i want to do that instead of study. can you take a pic for me?
i am IN!
i've had cupcakes from 'sprinkles' here. YUMM
yeah. i know this! cupcakes should be our family dessert.
how did i miss the cupcake camp tweet?
can't wait! I love full moons.
i wish i were a little bit taller. i wish i were a baller. i wish i had a girl who looked good, i would call her.
I want to tag along the next time you guys do one of these. Yes, I am shamelessly inviting myself.
where do you get the hot chocolate smoothies.
same with the shiny back of the ipod :)
of course I don't mind :)
absolutely. the union is the parasite making the big 3 fail. Why aren't europe/asian automakers in USA failing? they must get it
you got the butter burger at Culvers, right? I heart culvers.
saw you in a commercial for mOZy today! congrats.
Done with test now time for quktrip run. Yay sweet tea
Hey az. I'm in a tshirt and its december. Why can't you act like all the other states?
Onm
Hour until test time. Wish me luck. :)
didn't even realize it's Wednesday until I actually went to Starbucks. Good or Bad? BTW - I have a test today. So not ready for it.
Friends dog isn't doing so well.
turns out i have an upper respiratory infection. yuck.
ack- i'm starting to feel sick. itchy throat and sniffly nose. hope its not strep.
note to self: when doc says meds u r about 2 take leave a metallic taste in mouth. don't laugh. believe him.
burned finger on flat iron and @starbucks girls had some burn-free for me. i love my starbucks.
dear mcd's: sweet tea is supposed to b really sweet. Please see quiktrip on gilbert & warner for details.
apparently - i'm still learning how to twitter as I didn't Direct reply but replied to the twitterveerse
Shopping with my sis. guess quality yime with fam trumps studying. :(
Says my niece at costco: i want to try the examples.
Dear skinny jeans trend, please go away. U r making me sick. Love, my eyes
Also: best buy in-store pickup can kiss my ass. It would have been faster to pick out my stuff and wait in cashier line. Put more peeps ...
Going to the mall. can't wait for the crowds. that last sentence is said with plenty of sarcasm.
Dear me: please stop thinking that you can be prepared for Christmas early. it never works. Stop trying. kisses, me
twittering instead of my take-home final. What is wrong with me?
